title: [Admission] Advice on if I have a chance of getting a seat, please
content:
With such less seats in every branch and negative seats(what do they even mean exactly?) in some, is there any chance of getting a seat in CSE, AIML, or Circuital for a student with a rank 4640? I got mechanical in the first round, and I didn't take it. Thinking logically, I have a very low to no chance imo. They literally asked the candidates with a rank between 4000 to 6000 to not even bring DDS. Should I attend the counseling anyway, hoping for luck?

https://preview.redd.it/90khb10nmndf1.jpg?width=899&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=cc75bf32d93ad9c0435c58f5c876856bc7d0368a

comments.body: I am also confused  have a rank ok 4.2k
attend counselling if you have nothing else to do, most likely you won't be getting, hopefully kcet counselling seats will be there
Yeah, I guess........ I am from outside Karnataka, so I don't have a chance through KCET, thanks! Oh, what about you? Are you attending?

RR CSE will drop 

Others will remain pretty much the same ig
ill probably attend, not sure tho
Sit through but dont keep high expectations. If u get youd b lucky
